name: textlint-rule-blacklist-ja
description: NGワードでフィルタリングする汎用 textlint rule

scripts.phantom: mochify test/*.ls --reporter spec --extension .ls --extension .es6 --transform browserify-livescript --transform [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ]
scripts.node: mochify test/*.ls --reporter spec --extension .ls --extension .es6 --transform browserify-livescript --transform [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ] --node
scripts.test: npm run node && npm run phantom

author: Koki Takahashi <hakatasiloving@gmail.com>
